reviews.review_text: This day would of not been complete without my dress. After struggling to find anything different in wedding dresses I contacted Hrissa at Elika in Love. I had seen a picture of the dress I loved but it wasn t in stock. So I went in for a consultation to see what we could do. Over 30 swatches of lace later I picked the lace I thought was pretty. You can imagine how thrilled I was when it turned out to be stunning with tiny tasteful sequins, the perfect accent to my winter wedding. Through my meetings with Hrissa she hand crafted the dress of my dreams. I never thought I d get the  say yes to the dress  feeling but I couldn t stop smiling. And on the day of my wedding I didn t want to take it off, stunning and comfortable. I can t wait to have the reception so I can wear it again.

It was a pleasure to meet Hrissa and her beautiful gowns. I had a wonderful experience trying on her own creations as well as other affordable lines she carries in her studio. Would recommend stopping by this Mount Pleasant jewel for any one looking for a one-of-a-kind dress!

Wow, where to begin! Hrissa, was soooo nice and informative during my visit. To be honest with you I ve probably visited about 9 store before I came to this one and she was the nicest out of all those other bridal stores. I actually was eyeing another dress online and they didn t have it in stock to try. Hrissa, took the time to show me on a mannequin how the dress might look on me. Because she is a designer as well, she gave me a lot of insight on dresses that would look good on my body. While I didn t find my dress this visit with her, she gave me a lot of pointers on what to look for in the future. Also the dresses she designs herself are just gorgeous, definitely visit this spot (very boho/New York fashion week!)! Her designs are just soooo dreamyyy

Hrissa is a top notch bespoke designer. From the moment I visited her studio, shes greeted me with a warm attitude without compromising any professionalism. I love the fabrics she chooses for each of her dress (they are so unique and form-fitting!). Hrissas designs are extremely romantic and flattering. She is also great at communicating and following up to make sure I get all my questions answered. This is so important for a custom piece. I am so happy with my service with Hrissa at Elika in Love! Thank you so much! xx

I loved the dress that I bought from Elika in Love - it was flowy and perfect and fit like a dream. It was important to me during my wedding to work with designers who made beautiful things, particularly if they were involved in the process. So, on a trip to Vancouver I met Hrissa and ended up buying the first dress I tried on! It was lovely and perfect and looks as great in the photos as it felt to wear it. I also loved that I was able to get the dress in a colour that was verging on cream -- I have never felt really good wearing white or even ivory. And it matched the day and my husbands suit perfectly. Pro tip: Because if the train, the Athena works really well if you get married on a windy day.

Hrissa created my ultimate dream dress!! She went above and beyond to make me feel comfortable and involved in the process. This experience was a million times better than buying from a large store where you never get to meet the actual designer and creator of your wedding dress. This whole process was so much fun and the dress is even better than what I imagined! If I could give you more stars I would - thank you Hrissa!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Alex, thank you for the wonderful review! It was an absolute dream working with you to make your Elle gown customized specifically for you:) Thanks for taking the plunge with Elika In Love, and making the trips from Kelowna all the way to Vancouver for your fittings! Cant wait to see the photos from the wedding! xx Hrissa

reviews.review_text: Hrissa and her designs are so equally charming and beautiful. I went to her after seeing her Elle gown featured in a BC Wedding Magazine. And Im so glad I did! Dresses are tried on in Hrissas well-lit studio and it already feels like magic with the bright surroundings and personalized experience. Although professional, Hrissa is not precious with her designs and truly works with the wearer to tailor the dress to fit the married vision of the designer and the wearer. Shes open to requests for custom tweaks, and makes recommendations when the need to be lead is evidenced. If youre looking for a romantic dress and experience, Elika In Love is the perfect studio to do so. Thank you, Hrissa!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: You are the loveliest, Olivia!!! Amazing energy and an absolute joy to work with. xx Hrissa

reviews.review_text: Hrissa is a true visionary. Her bridal designs are stunning, unique and thoughtful. The styles range from beautiful boho to sexy glam. I love that each dress is handmade. She really goes above and beyond to understand her clients vision for their wedding day to create memorable bridal gowns.

We had a lovely time meeting Hrissa. Her collection of gowns are plentiful, and we were greeted with a very warm and vibrant studio. I highly recommended anyone whos looking for bridal gowns to make an appointment to see Hrissa!

I couldn t be more happy with my wedding dress! Harrisa is such a gem! I found her after I had already a full day of shopping for a dress, frustrated that I was having a hard time finding one I loved for my special day and she was amazing to work with! I told her what I had pictured in my head and she exceeded beyond what I had imagined! It was absolutely stunning! Her style and designs are unique and beautiful and she is a lovely person to work with :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Chloe, you were an absolute dream to work with! Creating your custom lace wedding gown was such a pleasure, and you and your family were so lovely during our fittings! It was great to have you come to the studio and work together on your dream gown. You looked incredible and I cant wait to upload the photos from your wedding and share them with everyone:) xx Hrissa Designer / Creative Director www.elikainlove.com

reviews.review_text: after a very full day of wedding dress shopping with my daughter, and her trying on hundreds.. literally hundreds ! of dresses, to no avail. Everything looked the same. Exhausted we google searched and chanced upon Elika in love. Made an appointment for the next day. Chloe tried on three dresses, all looked amazing but with the final dress her face absolutely glowed! She had found the dress. Harissa was game to make the modifications chloe wanted. It was such a calm, comfortable experience, like a visit with a friend. Harissa was incredible to work with  and took so much stress out of the dress shopping experience The dress turned out beyond amazing. Any bride looking for THE dress , a classic local made original ...look here. ( there was even one I coveted but one must let the bride shine lol)

Elikas dresses are simply gorgeous. Its so refreshing to discover bridal options in Van that are unique with an ode to elegance. She truly cares about each customer, and her glowing energy shines through in-person and with her designs.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ola! Thank you so much! We had such a wonderful time helping you find your wedding dress! Cant wait to see the photos from the wedding! xx Hrissa

reviews.review_text: We are lucky to have such an amazingly talented and sophisticated bridal designer in Vancouver. Hrissa is the loveliest to work with and she makes DREAM gowns!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you SO MUCH Sarah! It was such a pleasure to work with you to help you find the one! xx Hrissa

reviews.review_text: I had my first ever wedding dress experience today and it was a great one! Thank you to Elika in Love for showing me such beautiful dresses and helping me to find my style!
It was very lovely to work with Hrissa.  She was so understanding, & made the experience so easy & pleasant & stress free from the very start.  I couldn t be more happy with the work she did.
If youre looking for fresh, effortless design look no further. Elikas newest collection is amazing and I was thrilled with my dress!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Kari, you were such a wonderful bride to work with! It was a true pleasure to be part of your journey from finding the one to your wedding day! Congratulations Kari!!!

reviews.review_text: Well designed bridal dresses great to look at.

I just wanted to thank you for your help and expertise in my dress shopping with you this past weekend. Im so glad I chose you as my shop, not only because the dress was perfect, but because it fit so well and was such great quality
